root.name: Munch Man
root.description: IntroductionFour cunning Hoonos are in hot pursuit of your Munch Man. Can he make it to an energizer in time to change teh attack, or will the Hoonos devour him?With the Munch Man game, you must out-maneuver four Hoonos, as you try to connect the passages with one continuous chain, without being eaten.The Munch Man module challenges you to:Score points by connecting the passages with a chain.Score points by capturing Hoonos while your Munch Man is energized.Avoid being eaten by the Hoonos.ControlsMovement on the screen can be controlled by the Wired Remote Controllers or from the keyboard.VersionsMunch Man is available as either a Solid State Software Command Module or a diskette-based game. Note that the diskette-based version requires the TI Disk Memory System, the Memory Expansion unit, and must be used with either the TI Extended BASIC or Editor/Assembler Command Module (all sold separately).
